fullName: User Sign In and Sign Up API Validations: Signup validation with duplicate email and same ID

name: Signup validation with duplicate email and same ID

steps.name: Given  I prepare a unique user with email prefix "vakq" and password "vakq"
Then  validate signup response code is 200 and message contains "User created successfully"
Signup succeeded. Message: User created successfully
When  I sign up with the same email and a new ID using prefix "vakq" and password "vakq"
Signup with same email tried: vakq_user_8f24cda8
Then  validate signup response code is 400 and message contains "Email already registered"
Expected failure received. Message: Email already registered
When  I sign up with the same ID and a new email using prefix "vakq" and password "vakq"
Signup with same ID tried: ID=46635, Email=user_6fae8e53
Then  validate signup response code is 500 and message contains "Internal Server Error"
Expected error in raw response: Internal Server Error
